summary: Adds a custom-voiced female follower to the game. Requires Dawnguard DLC.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This mod requires the Dawnguard DLC.

So, who is she?[left]Halanna is one of the few snow elves who survived the race's downfall. Once a priestess of Auri-El, she has spent 4000 years in the Forgotten Vale, along with Knight-Paladin Gelebor.

In combat, she is fairly versatile, and can use ranged weapons, restoration magic, a little bit of destruction magic, and a sword and shield.Â [/left][/size][size=3]Features
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Halanna will use her gifts from Auri-El to heal you in battle.[/size]
[*][size=3]She has 1000 lines of dialogue about locations, NPCs, quests, and you, of course.[/size]
[*][size=3]She can be married, though initially she will be wary of romance.[/size]
[/list]
author: bethanyk1879
